roles.title: User-Centered Design
roles.subtitle: Crafting intuitive and delightful user experiences
roles.description: I create intuitive and delightful user experiences by focusing on user needs. I love turning complex problems into simple, elegant solutions.

roles.title: Design Systems
roles.subtitle: Building scalable and cohesive design systems
roles.description: I build scalable design systems that help maintain a consistent and cohesive user experience across large-scale applications.

roles.title: Full Stack Development
roles.subtitle: Delivering end-to-end solutions
roles.description: I develop full-stack web applications, bringing ideas to life by combining thoughtful design with clean, efficient code.

roles.title: Data-Driven Design
roles.subtitle: Leveraging data for informed design decisions
roles.description: I use data-driven insights to inform my design decisions, continuously improving products to deliver real value and measurable results.

process.title: Research
process.description: Discovering and understanding the problem space and learning about the user. Bonus: I can use data analytics to gain insights from datasets.

process.title: Principles & Strategy
process.description: Creating design principles to help guide the project and UX decisions. Ensures alignment across the team.

process.title: User Journey
process.description: Diving deep into user journey, user stories, and user decision making.

process.title: Exploration
process.description: Exploring a wide range of possible solutions. Testing, iterating, discussing and working through the problem.

process.title: Refinement
process.description: Refining a chosen solution, polishing until it’s ready for handover to the developers. Documenting design decisions.

process.title: Handover
process.description: Working closely with the dev team to ensure a successful handover and implementation process. I can be an extra pair of hands for front-end implementation.

process.title: Supporting
process.description: Keep monitoring implementation process, in case improvements need to be made.

values.title: Making a Positive Impact
values.description: I believe in creating designs and products that make a positive difference in the world. Every decision I make aims to create meaningful, accessible, and inclusive experiences.

values.title: Curiosity & Iteration
values.description: I approach design with an experimentation mindset, asking myself 'What if?', and continuously testing and iterating to learn faster and drive innovation. I value data-driven decisions to solve complex user challenges.

values.title: Collaboration and Versatility
values.description: I thrive in collaborative environments—whether it’s working with centralised design teams or cross-functional teams. My experience across various industries, including education, SaaS, and emerging tech, helps me bring a well-rounded perspective to every project.

values.title: Attention to Detail
values.description: Great design is in the details. I’m meticulous about ensuring that every element works harmoniously, whether it’s pixel-perfect UI, clean code, or a smooth user flow.

values.title: Balancing Creativity & Logic
values.description: I believe great solutions emerge when creativity meets logic. I love blending imaginative ideas with a solid technical foundation to create designs that are not only beautiful but also functional and scalable.

values.title: Lifelong Learning
values.description: I’m always curious and eager to learn. Whether it’s a new design approach, a coding framework, or an analytics tool, I embrace continuous learning to stay ahead and improve my craft.
